feature.name: otmh_enable
feature.doc: Enable/Disable OTMH. '1' means that otmh is supported, '0' means no support.

define.name: pph_vsi_selection_size
define.doc: Size of VSI selection field

feature.name: fwd_header_offset_calc_with_egress_pars_idx
feature.doc: PPH Forwarding Header Offset calculation. '1' means calculation uses egress parsing index, '0' means not use egress parsing index.

feature.name: jericho_mode_sys_header_is_supported
feature.doc: Jericho system header support. '1' means support, '0' means not support.

sub_module.name: hw_bug
sub_module.doc: Bugs related to system header construction

feature.name: fhei_mpls_cmd_from_eei
feature.doc: If set, means MPLS command in FHEI is from EEI[23:20], else configured globally

feature.name: unknown_address
feature.doc: If set, FAI[0] indicates forwarding lookup result, else FAI[0] is not for unknown address

define.name: fhei_mpls_swap_remark_profile_size
define.doc: Size of remark_profile mapped from mpls swap command
